Fbi Crack Down

23 Dec 2006

WASHINGTON, D.C. - Michael J. Garcia, and Assistant Director Louis M. Reigel of the FBI's Cyber Division today announced the first criminal enforcement action targeting individuals committing Defacing crimes. The FBI is tracking down the lead man of one of the largest known hacking click. The group going by ATI is under criminal investigation after several web sites were defaced. "After the criminals gain access they're posting Turkish flags and very suspicious threats", Said Michael Garcia. The FBI recently discovered the hackers are not in Turkey as they suspected but, located inside of the United States.\n
